testsuite.name: Validation Tests

testcase.name: Invalid module should throw InvalidDataException with all error messages
Assignment with null dueDate should fail validation
Student with null email should fail validation
Invalid instructor should throw InvalidDataException with all error messages
Invalid course should throw InvalidDataException with all error messages
Invalid student should throw InvalidDataException with all error messages
Invalid assignment should throw InvalidDataException with all error messages
Course with null startDate should fail validation
